Antagonize.name: Antagonize
Antagonize.description: Its Frightened condition can't decrease to less than 1 at the end of its turn until it either uses a hostile action against you or can no longer observe or sense you for at least 1 round.

Effect: Albatross Curse (Failure).name: Effect: Albatross Curse (Failure)
Effect: Albatross Curse (Failure).description: Failure The albatross hangs around a cord from the target's neck (or closest equivalent) for 1 minute, cursing them for their transgression. During this time, the target must roll twice and take the worse result on their next Will save, after which the albatross disappears.

Effect: Allegro.name: Effect: Allegro
Effect: Allegro.description: Granted when someone uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IQchIYUwbsVTa9Mc] on you, It gains the Quickened condition and can use the additional action to Strike, Stride, or Step.

Effect: Aromatic Lure (Critical Failure).name: Effect: Aromatic Lure (Critical Failure)
Effect: Aromatic Lure (Critical Failure).description: You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 4} and moves to the selected location via the most direct route possible for 1 round, bypassing any obvious hazards and enemies in the way. If the creature reaches the destination, it must remain in that location for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds} but can otherwise act normally.

Effect: Aromatic Lure (Failure).name: Effect: Aromatic Lure (Failure)
Effect: Aromatic Lure (Failure).description: You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} and moves toward the selected location via the most direct route possible for 1 round, bypassing any obvious hazards and enemies in the way.

Effect: Aromatic Lure (Success).name: Effect: Aromatic Lure (Success)
Effect: Aromatic Lure (Success).description: You are distracted by the tantalizing scents, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round.

Effect: Befuddle (Critical Failure).name: Effect: Befuddle (Critical Failure)
Effect: Befuddle (Critical Failure).description:
You sow seeds of confusion in your target's mind, causing their actions and thoughts to become clumsy.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 3}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 3}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}.

Effect: Befuddle (Failure).name: Effect: Befuddle (Failure)
Effect: Befuddle (Failure).description:
You sow seeds of confusion in your target's mind, causing their actions and thoughts to become clumsy.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2}.

Effect: Befuddle (Success).name: Effect: Befuddle (Success)
Effect: Befuddle (Success).description:
You sow seeds of confusion in your target's mind, causing their actions and thoughts to become clumsy.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1}.

Effect: Bend Time.name: Effect: Bend Time
Effect: Bend Time.description: You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl] this turn. You can use your extra action to Stride.

Effect: Channeling Block.name: Effect: Channeling Block
Effect: Channeling Block.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.75Y1Lk9JE3q1vDA2]

Roll 1d8 for each rank of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs] spell, and increase the shield's Hardness by the total for this block.

Effect: Chaotic Spell.name: Effect: Chaotic Spell
Effect: Chaotic Spell.description:
The spell's damage type changes to the type below associated with the result of the roll, and each creature who is damaged by the spell takes the listed additional effect.

1 (Acid): @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}

2 (Cold): -10 ft. penalty to all Speeds until the end of your next turn

3 (Electricity): @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the end of your next turn

4 (Fire): Persistent fire damage equal to the spell's rank

5 (Force): No added effect

6 (Sonic):@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 2 rounds

6.text:
Each creature who is damaged by the spell takes the listed additional effect.

1 (Acid): @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}

2 (Cold): -10 ft. penalty to all Speeds until the end of your next turn

3 (Electricity): @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the end of your next turn

4 (Fire): Persistent fire damage equal to the spell's rank

5 (Force): No added effect

6 (Sonic):@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 2 rounds

Effect: Concealed.name: Effect: Concealed
Effect: Concealed.description: You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W] until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Concealed for 1 round.name: Effect: Concealed for 1 round
Effect: Concealed for 1 round.description: You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W] for 1 round, but can't use the concealment to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa].

Effect: Demoralize Immunity 10 minutes.name: Effect: Demoralize Immunity 10 minutes
Effect: Demoralize Immunity 10 minutes.description: Granted when someone uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF] on you, rendering you temporarily immune to Demoralize for the duration.

Effect: Feint (Critical Success) from.name: Effect: Feint (Critical Success) from
Effect: Feint (Critical Success) from.description: Actor is fooled, but only momentarily. The actor is off-guard against the next melee attack against it until the end of your next turn..

Effect: Feint (Success) from.name: Effect: Feint (Success) from
Effect: Feint (Success) from.description: Actor is fooled, but only momentarily. The actor is off-guard against the next melee attack.

Effect: Grabbed until end of attacker ne.name: Effect: Grabbed until end of attacker next turn
Effect: Grabbed until end of attacker ne.description: Target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei] until the end of your next turn unless you move or your target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes}.

Effect: Haste.name: Effect: Haste
Effect: Haste.description: Granted when someone uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4] on you, It gains the Quickened condition and can use the extra action each round only for Strike and Stride actions.

Effect: Mighty Rage.name: Effect: Mighty Rage
Effect: Mighty Rage.description: The first Strike you make during your first turn deals additional damage equal to your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Ah5g9pDwWF9b9VW9] damage.

Effect: Raise a Tome.name: Effect: Raise a Tome
Effect: Raise a Tome.description: You raise up the book you're holding and flip it open to defend yourself and expedite your studies. The book remains raised until the start of your next turn. While you have a book raised, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and a +1 circumstance bonus to Recall Knowledge to identify creatures using a skill related to the subject of the book (Arcana if you're using your spellbook). This bonus is in addition to any item bonus the book normally gives to the check.

Effect: Red-Gold Mortality.name: Effect: Red-Gold Mortality
Effect: Red-Gold Mortality.description: When the target would regain Hit Points, such as from a healing effect or an ability like fast healing or regeneration, it must attempt a Will save against your class DC to determine the effects, and then the marking fades. The marking otherwise fades after 1 minute.

Effect: Remorseless Lash.name: Effect: Remorseless Lash
Effect: Remorseless Lash.description: Its Frightened condition can't decrease to less than 1

Effect: Restrained until end of attacker.name: Effect: Restrained until end of attacker next turn
Effect: Restrained until end of attacker.description: Target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM] until the end of your next turn unless you move or your target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes}.

Effect: Spike Skin.name: Effect: Spike Skin
Effect: Spike Skin.description:
You touch a willing creature, causing its skin to harden and form spiky protrusions. The target gains resistance 4 to all physical damage (except adamantine). Whenever a creature damages the target with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon, the attacking creature takes @Damage[(floor((@item.level -8)/2)*2+2)[piercing]] damage.

This impulse lasts for 10 minutes, but each time the target takes physical damage, the duration decreases by 1 minute. The target is temporarily immune to this impulse for 1 hour. If you use Spike Skin again, any previous one ends.

Level (+2) The resistance and damage each increase by 2.

Effect: Subsist (Failure).name: Effect: Subsist (Failure)
Effect: Subsist (Failure).description: You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw] until you attain sufficient food and shelter.

Effect: Vigilant Eye (Armor).name: Effect: Vigilant Eye (Armor)
Effect: Vigilant Eye (Armor).description: You aren't Off-Guard to Hidden or Undetected creatures of the eye's level or lower, or creatures of the eye's level or lower using surprise attack, though you can still be flanked.

Effect: Vigilant Eye (Weapon).name: Effect: Vigilant Eye (Weapon)
Effect: Vigilant Eye (Weapon).description: When you make a Strike with the weapon against a target that's Concealed, hidden, or undetected, the DC of your flat check to target it is 4 if the target is concealed or 10 if it's hidden or undetected.

Effect: Vigilant Eye Greater (Weapon).name: Effect: Vigilant Eye Greater (Weapon)
Effect: Vigilant Eye Greater (Weapon).description: When you make a Strike with the weapon against a target that's Concealed, hidden, or undetected, the DC of your flat check to target it is 3 if the target is concealed or 9 if it's hidden or undetected.

Effect: Vigilant Eye Major (Weapon).name: Effect: Vigilant Eye Major (Weapon)
Effect: Vigilant Eye Major (Weapon).description: When you make a Strike with the weapon against a target that's Concealed, hidden, or undetected, the DC of your flat check to target it is 2 if the target is concealed or 8 if it's hidden or undetected.

Spell Effect: Ill Omen (Critical Failure.name: Spell Effect: Ill Omen (Critical Failure)
Spell Effect: Ill Omen (Critical Failure.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6ZIKB0151LUR19Rw]

Critical Failure Every time during the duration that the target attempts an attack roll or skill check, it must roll twice and use the worse result.

Spell Effect: Ill Omen (Failure).name: Spell Effect: Ill Omen (Failure)
Spell Effect: Ill Omen (Failure).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6ZIKB0151LUR19Rw]

Failure The first time during the duration that the target attempts an attack roll or skill check, it must roll twice and use the worse result.

Spell Effect: Laughing Fit (Critical Fai.name: Spell Effect: Laughing Fit (Critical Failure)
Spell Effect: Laughing Fit (Critical Fai.description: The target fallsProne and can't use actions or reactions for 1 round. It then takes the effects of a failure.

Spell Effect: Laughing Fit (Failure).name: Spell Effect: Laughing Fit (Failure)
Spell Effect: Laughing Fit (Failure).description: The target isSlowed 1 and can't use reactions.

Spell Effect: Laughing Fit (Success).name: Spell Effect: Laughing Fit (Success)
Spell Effect: Laughing Fit (Success).description: The target is plagued with uncontrollable laughter. It can't use reactions.

Spell Effect: Nudge Fate.name: Spell Effect: Nudge Fate
Spell Effect: Nudge Fate.description: The barest spin of your patron's spool is enough to alter fate. When the target fails an attack roll, skill check, or saving throw and a +1 status bonus would turn a critical failure into a failure, or failure into a success, you grant the target a +1 status bonus to the check retroactively, changing the outcome appropriately. The spell then ends.

Spell Effect: Synesthesia.name: Spell Effect: Synesthesia
Spell Effect: Synesthesia.description: The target's senses are suddenly rewired in unexpected ways, causing them to process noises as bursts of color, smells as sounds, and so on. This has three effects, and the target must attempt a Will save. Due to the distraction, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] each time it uses a concentrate action, or the action fails and is wasted. The target's difficulty processing visual input makes all creatures and objects @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W] from it. The creature has trouble moving, making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 3} and giving it a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds.

1.text: Must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5|name:Synesthesia] or the action fails and is wasted.
